name: Focus Buddy
headline: AI Productivity Coach you speak with while working to stay focusedâ¦
description:
Reach out to us at founders@focusbuddy.ai

Focus buddy is an AI productivity coach that stays on calls with you and help you accomplish your important work goals on a daily basis, even when you are struggling to focus.

We noticed that our users develop a productive relationship with Focus Buddy. Users stay on calls for multiple hours everyday where they depend on Focus Buddy to:
â¢ Avoid procrastination and get started: Address hidden anxieties, embrace imperfection, chunk tasks, kickstart with mini-goals, and use regular check-ins to maintain momentum.
â¢ Recover from distractions and stay focused: Focus Buddy detects when they are working on less important tasks or scrolling on social media, help them overcome the underlying concerns feeding the distraction, and help them get back to the important task
â¢ Manage stress and Prevent Burnout: Focus Buddy detects stress buildup, integrates mindfulness habits to the workflow, helps take short rejuvenating breaks, and stay composed.

Our Initial ICP is people with ADHD who are highly motivated but also highly blocked by internal and environmental factors. In the future, we believe each worker should have their own personal coach that enforces proven productivity techniques in real time to help them extract more focused hours every day with the same effort.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:consumer; industry:productivity; industry:mental-health; industry:conversational-ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Adnan Sherif, Founder
founders.description: CEO Focus Buddy. Ex ML @ Google working on Generative AI on the Pixel Phone. Ex ML Researcher @ UC Berkeley Sky Lab

founders.name: Yash Ramchandani, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder of Focus Buddy. Previously PM @ Google working on AI features on the Pixel phone, and Ads for stores trying to drive in-store traffic

raw_markdown="[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9513220833b43c922f6c9/66d95f81ad1e7d10bbbd553a_focusbuddy.svg)](https://www.focusbuddy.ai/</>)
[How it works](https://www.focusbuddy.ai/<#features>)
[](https://www.focusbuddy.ai/<#>)
# Get more done than ever before
An AI co-pilot that stays on call with you to manage your to-do list, help avoid procrastination, and find the behavioral patterns that are holding you back.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9513220833b43c922f6c9/66d96b2635ea639d823f99a8_focusbuddy-banner.jpg)
# How Focus Buddy works
### Work on the Right Thing at the Right Time
As you co-work with the AI, it learns what you're working on, what's left, and what's done. It automatically keeps your to-do list up-to-date, ensuring you never miss a high-priority task
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9513220833b43c922f6c9/66d97431f409012c03ce80f9_stay-focused.png)
### Check Ins that Hold you Accountable
Our coach checks in while you work, helping you talk through concerns, address perfectionism, and overcome barriers to getting started.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9513220833b43c922f6c9/66d97430b58155d9ad5301a9_avoid-procrastination.png)
### Insights Into How you Work
By being there as you work, the AI learns your burnout patterns, distractions, time estimation errors, and peak productivity times. It shares these insights weekly, with real-time coaching coming soon!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9513220833b43c922f6c9/66d97430d77b328fa059d5b2_manage-stress.png)
### Anonymous and Affordable
Our goal is to make Focus Buddy affordable and accessible to everyone. Focus Buddy is free for general use. And paid for a personalized version available to a select few.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9513220833b43c922f6c9/66d974302d337f56dfa8acc5_affordable.png)
### Available 24x7
Co-work with your AI productivity coach at any time for as long as you need.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9513220833b43c922f6c9/66d974306a1833348a0fa187_available.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d98794a78e7e0767b5e804/66d98794a78e7e0767b5e868_Hero%20Shape%20CTA.svg)
## What our users have to say...
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9513220833b43c922f6c9/66d98fb5fabf5289bf39b877_quotes.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9513220833b43c922f6c9/66d987b6c9a693f8a380f520_icn.svg)
Wait! This is sickI'd been postponing getting a doctors appointment for so long. Then I called it, started procrastinating again, until it spoke to me and said let's just get started by opening the portal - and then guided me until I got into flow myself!Now i have an appointment! Insane!
- Anonymous
Product Operations Analyst w/ ADHDShe/Her
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9513220833b43c922f6c9/66d98fb5fabf5289bf39b877_quotes.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9513220833b43c922f6c9/66d987b6c9a693f8a380f520_icn.svg)
My good sir. I really really like this, as someone who’s username on [Redacted] is “adhd squirrel”, I get distracted very very easily. This is amazing for me. I have a bunch of friends who also have ADHD, I’m going to put this on all their radars
- Anonymous
Data Engineer w/ ADHDHe/Him
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9513220833b43c922f6c9/66d98fb5fabf5289bf39b877_quotes.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66d9513220833b43c922f6c9/66d987b6c9a693f8a380f520_icn.svg)
Hey Yash! It’s been great using the product! I feel much more engaged with my work day than I usually am this early. I’ve already gotten 1 large and 1 small task done that I’ve been putting off. I wish I’d had this assistant sooner!
- Anonymous
Software Engineer, UndiagnosedHe/Him

generated_description:
Focus Buddy is an intriguing startup born out of Y Combinator's Batch S24 in 2024, located in the bustling tech hub of San Francisco. The company’s mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to serve as your AI productivity coach, helping you stay focused while tackling your daily tasks, especially when distractions and procrastination threaten to derail your progress.

The core idea is that Focus Buddy keeps you company on calls as you work, turning what typically feels like a solitary grind into a more engaging experience. Users have reported spending multiple hours on these calls. The AI assists in several key areas:

1. **Starting Tasks**: For those battling procrastination, Focus Buddy helps uncover the root causes of hesitation—be it anxiety or perfectionism—encouraging users to break their work into manageable mini-goals. These check-ins create momentum and make the daunting tasks feel less intimidating.

2. **Maintaining Focus**: It meticulously monitors your activity, steering you back when it detects you veering off into less important tasks or the abyss of social media. By addressing the distractions head-on, it aims to reinforce your focus on what truly matters.

3. **Stress Management**: Focus Buddy is also in tune with your mental health, identifying signs of stress buildup and integrating mindfulness techniques into your workflow. Regular breaks are encouraged to help prevent burnout, ensuring you stay composed and productive.

The primary target audience for Focus Buddy is individuals with ADHD, who often face unique challenges in maintaining focus and productivity. However, the company envisions a future where every worker benefits from a personal productivity coach, one that employs effective techniques in real-time to help maximize output with the same effort.

The founders, a two-person team, have already started to make waves with positive user feedback, underscoring the effectiveness of their AI coach. Users describe the experience as transformative, feeling more engaged and equipped to tackle their tasks with less hesitation.

For anyone interested in exploring this service further, Focus Buddy has crafted a user-friendly platform with both free and personalized pricing tiers. It’s available around the clock, inviting you to work alongside your AI coach whenever you choose.

If productivity is something you struggle with, especially in this age of distractions, checking out Focus Buddy might just be the step you need to reclaim your focus and productivity. 

For more information, visit their website at [focusbuddy.ai](https://www.focusbuddy.ai/?ref=yc).
